mapper.sql: id, code, name, specification, unit, netcontent, piececount, piececontent, status
mapper.select: select t.*, u.id as uid,u.name as uname, m.id as mid,m.name as mname from productboxinfo t left outer join unit u on t.gu=u.id left outer join manure_type m on t.mtype = m.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, u.id as uid,u.name as uname, m.id as mid,m.name as mname from productboxinfo t left outer join unit u on t.gu=u.id left outer join manure_type m on t.mtype = m.id where t.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, u.id as uid,u.name as uname, m.id as mid,m.name as mname from productboxinfo t left outer join unit u on t.gu=u.id left outer join manure_type m on t.mtype = m.id where t.status=0
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, u.id as uid,u.name as uname, m.id as mid,m.name as mname from productboxinfo t left outer join unit u on t.gu=u.id left outer join manure_type m on t.mtype = m.id where t.status=0 order by pinyin;
select count(*) from productboxinfo where name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and status=0
select count(*) from productboxinfo where status=0
select count(*) from productboxinfo where status=0 and code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into productboxinfo
id,
code,
name,
specification,
unit,
netcontent,
piececount,
piececontent,
status,
gu,
kg,
mtype,
pinyin,

#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{netcontent,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

#{piececontent,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gu.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{kg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

#{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update productboxinfo
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netcontent = #{netcontent,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
piececount = #{piececount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
piececontent = #{piececontent,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gu = #{gu.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kg = #{kg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mtype = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update productboxinfo set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netcontent = #{netcontent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, piececount = #{piececount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, piececontent = #{piececontent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gu = #{gu.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kg = #{kg,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, mtype = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
